start.category_section.title: Destê alîkarîyê
start.category_section.text_1: Pêwîstîya te bi alîkarîya lezgîn heye? Şansa te heye jî ku tu alîkarîya kesekê din bikî.
start.category_section.text_2: Çi alîkarî ji te re pêwîst e?

start.partner_section.title: Hevkarên me
start.partner_section.text: Just Arrived pêşgaveka xêrxwazîyê ya mişterek e da alîkarîya kesên nûhatî bike ku daxilî bazara karî ya swêdî bibin. Weqfek xwedîya me ye û kombendeka şîrketan wê bi rê ve dibe.

assignment.created.title: Job created!
assignment.created.description: We will publish your assignment right away and notify you by email when you have your first applicant. If you have any suggestions of how we could improve our platform, don’t hesitate to contact admin@justarrived.se. Thank you!

company.create.description: Welcome! To hire workers in a positive and fair way, we need your organisation number. To take jobs you need to provide a personal ID number or a co-ordination number.

profile.chat.text: Peyam dê otomotîk ji zimanê te bên wergerandin. Em tewsîye dikin ku heger tu bikarî zimanê îngilîzî bi kar bîne da danûstandin çi qas mimkin be bi hêsanî bi rê ve biçin.
profile.chat.private_message: Tu li vir dikarî peyaman ji kargiran re bişînî. Tu dikarî bo nimûne hûrgilîyên karî, wextên wî û cihê ku hûn dê hevûdin lê bibînin bidî.
user.assignment.confirmation.title: Tu pêşnîyazekê ji {{candidate_name}} re dişînî
user.assignment.confirmation.description: {{candidate_name}} har 18 timmar på sig att tacka ja till uppdraget. Om {{candidate_name}} inte tackar ja inom 18 timmar kommer du att kunna välja en annan kandidat.
assignment.approve.description: To ensure that invoicing can take place and salary can be paid out, you and the job-performer need to confirm that the job has been completed.

assignment.total_cost.description: “Baca kardêrîyê û bacên civakî di heqî de ne”, “bêyî baca bikaranînê”
assignment.recommendation.title: How well do you think {{candidate_name}} carried out the job? Provide a rating, 1-5 stars, and write a review that will be added to {{candidate_name}} profile.
user.create.title: Hesabekê biafirîne
user.create.description: Welcome! To use JustArrived it is important that you have; 1) A personal ID number or a co-ordination number, 2) Work permit or AT-UND, 3) Access to a bank account. A co-ordination number is a temporary personal ID number which you can use to identify yourself towards the authorities and companies. It is a ten digit number and it is not the same as the number displayed at the LMA card. To apply for AT-UND please contact Migrationsverket. To obatin a co-ordination number please contact Skatteverket for more information.
user.form.ssn.validation: Please provide your personal ID number (or co-ordination number) as YYMMDDXXXX
user.form.orgnr.validation: Nimreya rêxistinê bi awayê XXXXXXXXXX bide
user.form.email.validation: Du måste ange en giltig e-post
user.form.zip.validation: Nimreya postê bi pênc reqeman bide
user.form.password.validation: Şîfre divê herî kêm 8 nîşan be

profile.create.title: Profîlê biafirîne
profile.create.description: Remember that a complete profile increases your chances of getting jobs.
profile.create.notification: Ev agahdarî di profîla te de tên parastin û di hemû daxwaznameyan de xuya dibin.
profile.create.confirmation.title: Your profile has been created
profile.create.confirmation.description: Here sindoqa xwe ya mailên hatî û bi rêya lînka ku me niha ji te re şandiye navnîşna e-posteya xwe tesdîq bike.
profile.created.assignment.pending.email: Yay! You have created a profile and applied for your first job!
If an employer sends you a job offer, you have 18 hours to accept it. You'll find the job under My Jobs. This is also where all communication between you and the employers take place.
profile.created.approved.email.title: Hesaba te hat aktîv kirin.
profile.created.approved.email.descripti: Niha tu hazir î ku tu li karên din bigerî.
profile.form.photo: Bi rêya tikandina li ser kamerayê, wêneyekê profîlê bar bike
profile.form.languages.description: Zimanên ku tu dipeyivî û/yan fêm dikî bide
profile.form.education.description: Te çi xwendiye û li kîjan astê?

profile.form.photo.validation: Hewce ye tu wêneyekê profîlê bar bikî
user.apply.confirmation: You have applied for the job
Vi på Just Arrived håller tummarna. Om uppdragstagaren skickar ett erbjudande har du 18 timmar på dig att tacka ja till uppdraget. Du hittar uppdraget under Mina Uppdrag. Där samlas även all kommunikation som sker med uppdragsgivaren.
user.account.description: Where would you like your salary to be paid out once you have completed the job?
user.assignment.company_approved: As soon as you and the job owner confirm completion, an invoice will be sent. Once that invoice is payed your salary will be paid out.
user.assignment.approve: Ma kar hatiye bi cih anîn?
user.assignment.add_reference: Ev kar dê ji bo referensên di profîla te de bê veguhastin.
user.assignment.rejected.detail: Çima te xwastiye vî karî nepejirînî?
user.assignment.rejected.confirmation.de: Em dê li pirsa te binêrin û çi qas zûtir karibin dê li te vegerin. Bi xêra nêrînên te em dikarin Just Arrivedê bikin xizmeteka baştir.
user.assignment.rating.submit.descriptio: Provide a star rating (1-5), and write a review that will be added to profile.
assignment.status.application_count: {{application_count}} daxwazname ji bo vî karî hene

assignment.status.invoice: Em dê di demekê nêzîk de fatûreyê bişînin.
assignment.status.applied.description: När din e-postadress är bekräftad kommer din ansökan synas för uppdragsgivaren.
assignment.status.question_asked: Te pirsek li ser vî karî kiriye
assignment.status.offer: Du har fått erbjudande om att utföra uppdraget. Svara inom
assignment.status.offer.approve: Would you still like to perform the assignment and can you commit to do so?
assignment.status.company_approved.appro: {{contractor_name}} kar pejirandiye! Ma ew li gor lihevhatinê hatiye kirin?
assignment.status.payment: Tu dê di demekê nêzîk de bedela xwe bistînî.

warning.title: Vi är ledsna
warning.description: Din profiltyp har tyvärr inte tillgång till denna funktion.
warning.url.title: Hem
cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: By using the justarrived.se website, you agree to the use of cookies by us and third parties to enhance your experience. For more information, or to change your cookie settings.
cookies.info.title: Om cookies
cookies.info.description: Vi använder cookies av tekniska skäl, för att underlätta användningen av våra tjänster och för att ge dig som användare relevant information när du besöker vår webbplats. Cookies används även för att mäta trafiken på vår webbplats, för insamling av statistik och för att förbättra våra tjänster. Genom att använda våra tjänster godkänner du att vi använder cookies, såvida du inte har inaktiverat dessa genom att ändra inställningarna för cookies i din webbläsare.
terms.title: title för villkor
translation.dynamic.title: Här kan du stänga av automatisk översättning och se original språket för denna avdelning av siten
translation.dynamic.off.title: Automatisk översättning är avstängd. Original språket och ditt valde språk är samma för denna avdelning av siten!
promo.title: Välkommen till Just Arrived!
promo.description: At the moment, Just Arrived is only availible for invited users. If you are interested in using the platform, please sign up on www.justarrived.se for the official launch in the autumn of 2016.
